metadata.title: CVE-2022-48856 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:gianfar: ethtool: Fix refcount leak in gfar_get_ts_infoThe of_find_compatible_node() function returns a node pointer withrefcount incremented, We should use of_node_put() on it when doneAdd the missing of_node_put() to release the refcount.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
